title: Resell skins?
body: I reckon we should be able to resell our skins because many of us have so much useless skins that we don't even use. I have heaps of doubles that I received from friends and strangers gifting me and I don't use them so theres really no point having them. I'm not asking for a refund, just a way to make use of these skins. Maybe like the old rune thing where they put in two skins and get a random one?

replies.body:
I've never heard of receiving duplicate skins. Your best bet is to send a ticket to support.

No doubt they will reimburse you RP / adequate compensation for having two of a kind.

I don't believe OP meant he has 2 of the same skin... I believe he meant he has multiple skins for many champs.
Thank you, a lot more sensical.

Yeah, thats what I meant :)
I don't see the point of owning two skins for the same champ because if you have 2, why would anyone ever want to play with the lower tier skin. What makes it even worse is if you don't even play the champion, yet you have two skins for the neglected champ.

They are working on a system like this with the mastery chests/keys and the crafting. On release it won't apply to content you already own, only the new stuff you receive through the chests, but theoretically it will eventually include content you already own. Basically you can combine content you get from the chests to get different content.
